# @terascope/error-parser

> Generic error parser

## Installation

```bash
# Using yarn
yarn add @terascope/error-parser
# Using npm
npm install --save @terascope/error-parser
```

This a package within the [Teraslice](https://github.com/terascope/teraslice) monorepo. See our [documentation](https://terascope.github.io/teraslice/docs/packages/error-parser/overview) for more information or the [issues](https://github.com/terascope/teraslice/issues?q=is%3Aopen+is%3Aissue+label%3Apkg%2Ferror-parser) associated with this package
